description: CopperLicht is a WebGL library and JavaScript 3D engine for creating games and 3d applications in the web browser. CopperLicht comes with a full 3D editor and supports all features necessary to create full 3d games in the browser. Unlike other WebGL 3D Engines, CopperLicht compiles your 3D meshes into a small, binary file which downloads quickly, reducing bandwith usage for your users.
name: CopperLicht
